oai_dc:dc.dc:title: LX-Battig
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The LX-Battig was created from Battig test.set (Baroni et al., 2010). This data set has 83 concrete concepts of the following 10 categories: mammals, birds, fish, vegetables, fruit, trees, vehicles, clothes, tools and kitchenware. The categories names and the concepts were translated by two translators and adjudicated by a third one.
